signSlapper

private boolean signSlapper(Block blk,
                            Player plr)
Check the sign to see if it is a HiddenSwitch Sign and try and use it if it is

Parameters:
blk - The sign found in onPlayerInteract as an instance of Block
plr - The player involved in the event
Returns:
true if successful, otherwise false
